name: Springless
description:
A unfortunate aeronautical accident leaves you stranded deep in the forest missing the ability to jump. If you want to make it out, you will need to find alternate ways to move vertically.

Credits:

Eric Li - Programming and Art

Matthew Dulworth (TheHelpfulWalnut) - Programming and Design

Music - Daniel Kim

Amy Li - Art

Noah Chisenhall - Level Design, Game Design

Jose Guerra - Mentor

Varun - Mentor

Sound effects created by solowiej, Zxin, Crcavol on freesound.org.

Created in 60 hours for UT Game Jam 2020.
